events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit as expected. I would like to request a refund or an exchange.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer requested money back due to size issues.
The support ticket has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and whether the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 789654321 and the jacket is brand new, I just tried it on once and it’s too small.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund immediately or arrange an exchange for a different size. Which option would you prefer?
I would like to proceed with the refund, please. Thank you for the quick response and help.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
Since you confirmed receipt of the refund and had no further issues, we are closing this case now. Thank you!
